about_the_game:
Drenched and exhausted, I somehow made it to Dunwich... Still oblivious to the horrors that would haunt me for the rest of my life.

FEATURES
  • Story based on the famous "Dunwich Horror" by H.P. Lovecraft, with a pinch of eldritch monsters and primordial evil.
  • Nightmarish atmosphere.
  • Fast-paced platforming.
  • Stealth mechanics.
  • Smart riddles and puzzles to unravel.
  • Rich Lovecraftian lore.
  • Four chapters.
  • Unique art style.

Wilbur Whateley was a name that used to describe the otherworldly monster that lived among humans.

After the infamous Salem witch trials, three families moved to what is now Dunwich: the Bishops, the Whateley, and the Sawyers. Two of them hid a terrifying ancient secret.

Yog-Sothoth knows the gate. Yog-Sothoth is the gate. Yog-Sothoth is the key and guardian of the gate. Past, present, future, all are one in Yog-Sothoth.

There is the monster in Dunwich, a creature from the darkest depths of human nightmares. Why now? Why here? You, and only you, Professor Armitage, can solve this horrible mystery.
